plugin.name: Arm_StatusPanel
plugin.author: JDM/www.robertpate.net
plugin.purpose: Displays vital stats. Enter InstallStatusPanel to set up your character's prompt.

muclient.script:
--[[ ###INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS###
Step 1: Save this file to your hard drive. I recommend the MushClient/worlds/plugins directory.
Steps 2-4: Hit shift-ctrl-p to open the plugins menu. Click the "Add" button. Navigate to where you saved this file and select it. Click Close.
Step 5: Hop into your Armageddon character and (optional) make note of your prompt (You can make a copy of it somewhere, for posterity, if you like, or add it in place of '%hhp_%vmv_%tst_%s_%w_%A>' on the end of the SendImmediate line below to retain your prompt in text, note that spaces may not work well)
Step 6: Send this command to arm: InstallStatusPanel
Note: If you use the status prompt, this will overwrite it.
Note: If your character dies, you just need to add the prompt back with this command: InstallStatusPanel
Note: If you have problems report them here: https://github.com/JamesDeMonet/armageddon-plugins/issues
]]--
-- Setup global settings and their default values
function InstallStatusPanel() -- Set the prompt in the game. -- Notice the \\n to create linebreaks in the prompt. The extra \ is needed otherwise the SendImmediate command will hit the enter key, so to speak, when it reads \n. SendImmediate ("prompt PROMPT_%a_%o_%O_%k_%e_LINEONE\\nPROMPT_%E_%A_%w_%h_%H_%t_%T_%v_%V_%m_%M_LINETWO\\nPROMPT_%s_manaoff_%S_LINE3\\n%hhp_%vmv_%tst_%s_%w_%A>") Tell ("Enjoy this status panel for Armageddon.\n") Tell ("If you have any issues, report them at\n") Tell ("https://github.com/JamesDeMonet/armageddon-plugins/issues\n") Tell ("Thanks to Agent_137 for his work on the original infobar!\n") -- Send harmless command to trigger the prompt to update in the game SendImmediate ("time")
end --- end InstallStatusPanel ---
function OnPluginCommandEntered(sText) if sText == "InstallStatusPanel" then InstallStatusPanel() else return sText end -- the function hasn't already returned so a match occurred. remove it from the command line. return "\t" end
function ManaOff() SendImmediate ("prompt PROMPT_%a_%o_%O_%k_%e_LINEONE\\nPROMPT_%E_%A_%w_%h_%H_%t_%T_%v_%V_%m_%M_LINETWO\\nPROMPT_%s_manaoff_%S_LINE3\\n%hhp_%vmv_%tst_%s_%w_%A>") ShowMana = false Tell("Ok, mana values are hidden.") SendImmediate ("time") end
function ManaOn() SendImmediate ("prompt PROMPT_%a_%o_%O_%k_%e_LINEONE\\nPROMPT_%E_%A_%w_%h_%H_%t_%T_%v_%V_%m_%M_LINETWO\\nPROMPT_%s_manaon_%S_LINE3\\n%hhp_%vmv_%tst_%s_%w_%A>") ShowMana = true Tell("Ok, showing mana values.") SendImmediate ("time") end
function StatusPanel(thename, theoutput, wildcards)
--Now creating variables with "local" command then filling them with the data from the prompt and trigger: --The numbers here match the corresponding entry into your prompt. i.e. %a (accent) is first, so it becomes wildcards[1], %o (language) is wildcards[2] --But it doesn't get assigned a number until it passes through the regex in the trigger: which is why you can't change one without changing all three. --From here on out, the info from your prompt is contained in the variables created below. i.e. your current health, %h from your prompt, is stored in CurrentHealth. local CurrentAccent CurrentAccent = wildcards [1] local CurrentLanguage CurrentLanguage = wildcards [2] local CurrentMood CurrentMood = wildcards [3] local CurrentRiding CurrentRiding = wildcards [4]--used by default. local CurrentTime CurrentTime = wildcards [5]--used by default. local CurrentEncumbrance CurrentEncumbrance = wildcards [6] local CurrentArmed CurrentArmed = wildcards [7]--used by default. local CurrentSpeed CurrentSpeed = wildcards [8]--used by default. local CurrentHealth CurrentHealth = tonumber(wildcards [9])--used by default. local CurrentHealthMax CurrentHealthMax = tonumber(wildcards [10])--used by default. local CurrentStun CurrentStun = tonumber(wildcards [11])--used by default. local CurrentStunMax CurrentStunMax = tonumber(wildcards [12])--used by default. local CurrentStamina CurrentStamina = tonumber(wildcards [13])--used by default. local CurrentStaminaMax CurrentStaminaMax = tonumber(wildcards [14])--used by default. local CurrentMana CurrentMana = tonumber(wildcards [15])--used by default. local CurrentManaMax CurrentManaMax = tonumber(wildcards [16])--used by default. local CurrentPosition CurrentPosition = wildcards [17]--used by default. local DisplayMana DisplayMana = wildcards [18]-- string used to toggle mana display local CurrentVerbosePosition CurrentVerbosePosition = wildcards [19]-- string used to get position info when fighting
--Send the status info to the UDP listener (indirect - does nothing if listener is not activated/enabled) UdpSend ("127.0.0.1", 11000, CurrentHealth .. "/" .. CurrentHealthMax .. "_*hp_" .. CurrentStamina .. "/" .. CurrentStaminaMax .. "_*mv_" .. CurrentStun .. "/" .. CurrentStunMax .. "_*st_" .. CurrentMana .. "/" .. CurrentManaMax .. "_*mn_" .. CurrentArmed .. "_*arm_" .. CurrentSpeed .. "_*spd_" .. CurrentPosition .. "_*pos_" .. CurrentRiding .. "_*rid_" .. CurrentEncumbrance .. "_*enc_" .. DisplayMana .. "_*disman_" .. CurrentVerbosePosition .. "_*verpos_" .. CurrentTime .. "_*time")
end --- end status panel ---
-- http://www.luafaq.org/
